DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether 6 month fiber supplementation improve ovulation woman polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study : Role Dietary Fiber PCOS Anovulation
DOC.detailed_description: We hypothesize 6 month fiber supplementation improve ovulation woman PCOS improve insulin sensitivity independent weight loss . In pilot study , determine feasibility conduct large double-blind , randomize trial woman PCOS test hypothesis . We evaluate 15 woman 10-month period , start 4-month intervention-free observation period determine effect ovulation add 22g/day fiber supplementation usual weight-maintenance diet ( achieve 28-36 g fiber/day assume baseline dietary fiber intake , could feasibly translate clinical practice .
